title: Exploring pathological link between antimicrobial and amyloid peptides
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00878A, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yijing Tang, Yanxian Zhang, Dong Zhang, Yonglan Liu, Ruth Nussinov, Jie Zheng
Amyloid peptides (AMYs) and antimicrobial peptides (AMPs) are considered as two distinct families of peptides. In this review, we examine recent developments in the potential interplay between AMYs and AMPs, as well as their pathological implications.
